ValidationRule.description: Close Date must be within 30 days past and 7 days future.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.OCS_Config_Settings_CSH__c.Validation_Rules_Disabled__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Closed"), ISCHANGED(Status__c), OR( Closed_Date__c > TODAY() + 7, Closed_Date__c < TODAY() - 30 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Close Date must be within the last 30 days and can be no more than 7 days in the future.
